addon:addon.name: AllPlay Binding
addon:addon.description: The AllPlay binding integrates devices compatible with Qualcomm AllPlay.

parameter.name: rewindSkipTimeInSec
parameter.label: Rewind Skip Time
parameter.description: Seconds to jump backwards if the rewind command is executed

parameter.name: fastForwardSkipTimeInSec
parameter.label: Fast Forward Skip Time
parameter.description: Seconds to jump forward if the fastforward command is executed

parameter.name: callbackUrl
parameter.label: Callback URL
parameter.description: URL to use for playing audio streams, e.g. http://192.168.0.2:8080

parameter.name: zoneMemberSeparator
parameter.label: Zone Member Separator
parameter.description: Separator which is used when sending multiple zone members to channel 'zonemembers'
